data.title: Top 21 IT Companies in India to look out for
data.meta_description: Discover the top 21 IT companies in India that are leading the Indian IT industry. Learn about the best IT firms in India that offer excellent career opportunities and are the top IT employers in India.
data.text:
Below are the top 21 IT Companies operating in India-

1. Microsoft

One of the largest companies in the world and one of the leading mnc companies in india, Microsoft tops the list of almost every IT company’s rankings made. Microsoft is undoubtedly one of the top tier 1 companies in India. Its headquarters are in Redmond, Washington (USA) and it provides employment to over 1.6 lakh people all over the world, more than 50% of which are US citizens. The firm was founded by Bill Gates and Paul Allen in 1975. Its products, especially the Microsoft Office, the operating system Windows, and the search window, Internet Explorer have been used at least once by each and every professional in the world

Total Revenue: USD 143 Billion

Image Source: CNet.com

2. TATA Consultancy Services

TCS was founded in 1968 under the name Tata Computer Systems by the Tata Group. It is the highest Indian company ranked at 64th in Forbes World’s Most Innovative Company ranking. It is one of the best IT MNC companies in India. Headquartered in Mumbai, it employs its largest workforce at its Chenna campus which is also its largest campus in India. It employs a whopping number of almost 5 lakh people all over the world, the biggest chunk being Indian citizens. The company offers services like IT consulting and IT services.

Total Revenue: USD 23 Billion

Image Source: PRNews Wire

3. Cognizant

Cognizant is one of the main indian IT companies which is assisting clients with changing their current business, working, and technology models with the everchanging advanced technologies. It was established in the year 1994 by Kumar Mahadeva and Francisco D’Souza and is headquartered in New Jersey, USA. It offers services like outsourcing, information technology, and business consulting to its clients. It employs around 2.9 lakh people all over the world and is also one of the famous IT companies in India.

Total Revenue: USD 16.7 Billion

Image Source: Official Website

4. Google

Google was founded in the year 1998 by Larry Page and Sergey Binn and is headquartered in California, USA, and has revolutionized the top IT MNC companies in India in more ways than one. Google offers services and products like online advertising, search engine (google.com), a plethora of software, cloud computing, and numerous hardware among others. Over the years, it has acquired several companies and corporations and is now among the Big 5 Tech companies, comprising Facebook, Microsoft, Amazon, and Apple. It employs around 1.4 Lakh people at its offices all over the world and one of the best IT companies to work for in India.

Total Revenue: 181.69 Billion

Image Source: CNet.com

5. Cisco Systems Inc.

Cisco Systems is a multinational technology corporation founded in 1984 by Leonard Bosack and Sandy Lerner and is headquartered in the centre of Silicon Valley in California, USA. This software company in India offers high technology services and products like networking software and hardware, and telecommunication equipment among others. It employs around 80 thousand people all over the world. With a market capitalization of USD 194.94 Billion, Cisco is the largest company in the networking and communication devices industry in the world and also ranks amongst the top tier 1 it companies in India.

Total Revenue: USD 49.3 Billion

Image Source: Bleeping Computer.com

6. Accenture

Accenture is an Irish MNC founded by Clarence DeLany in 1989 and is headquartered in Dublin, Ireland. It began its journey as a technology and business consulting division of an accounting company and was called Andersen Consulting until 2000. Accenture is one of the best IT companies in India that offers business processes and consulting services. It is a Fortune 500 company and has clients who incorporate 91 of the Fortune Global 100. Accenture has a headcount of over 5.3 Lakhs employees worldwide, out of which 1.5 Lakh are employed in India.

Total Revenue: USD 44.3 Billion

Image Source: Getty Images.com

7. IBM

The next one in our list of the best IT firms in the world is International Business Machine (IBM) is an American multinational corporation headquartered in New York. The company has a diverse portfolio of IT services and software products and are constantly expanding to meet the needs of its current and potential clients. That is why it is counted among the biggest IT companies in India. It was founded in 1911 as Computing Tabulating Recording Company by Charles Ranlett Flint, and now has operations in over 170 countries. IBM has the largest workforce, employing over 3.45 Lakhs people worldwide.

Total Revenue: USD 73.6 Billion

Image Source: Financial IT.com

8. Capgemini

Capgemini, a French company headquartered in Paris, is one of the leading IT companies in the world and one of the best IT service company in india. It has a strong global presence with operations in over 50 countries. It was founded in 1967 in Grenoble, France by Serge Kampf. The firm offers a plethora of IT services including consulting, outsourcing, and professional services among others. The company is driven by 2.7 Lakh employees worldwide. Undoubtedly, it is also one of the best Indian IT companies.

Total Revenue: USD 19.3 Billion

Image Source: Official Website

9. Oracle

Oracle is a computer technology IT firm located in Austin, Texas. It was previously headquartered in California. It was founded in 1977 by Larry Ellison, Bob Miner and Ed Oates in Santa Clara, California. The firm offers database technology, software, cloud-engineered systems, applications, databases, and clouds. The company employs over 1.35 Lakhs people worldwide and is now one of the largest IT company in India.

Total Revenue: USD 39.07 Billion

Image Source: Bloomberg.com

10. Deloitte

Deloitte is the biggest of the Big Four, comprising the world’s biggest accounting firms namely EY, PwC and KPMG. Deloitte in India offers IT consulting services, as two entities Deloitte India and Deloitte US- India (USI), mainly to bifurcate the clients in India and the United States. The company as a whole employs over 3.3 Lakh people globally. Founded in the year 1845 in London, Deloitte now has operations in more than 100 locations all over the world and is also amongst India’s top IT companies.

Total Revenue: USD 47.6 Billion

Image Source: Consultancy.eu

11. Hewlett Packard Enterprise

An IT firm, Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HP Enterprise) is headquartered in Houston, Texas (USA). It enables its customers to remain robust and upfront to the changing environment. The parent company Hewlett-Packard was founded in 1939 by Bill Hewlett and David Packard, which split in 2015 into HP Enterprise and HP Inc. The company offers IT services and products that support various IT services like Aruba Networks, Nimble Storage, Cloudline, etc. It employs around 60,000 people globally and it is one of the top it service based companies in India.

Total Revenue: USD 27 Billion

Image Source: ITPro.co.uk

12. HCL Technologies

HCL Technologies is an Indian IT service and consulting multinational company with its headquarters in Noida. Founded in 1946, HCL Tech was originally a part of HCL Enterprise and emerged as a separate entity in 1991 simultaneously entering the software services business. HCL Technologies is an Indian IT firm and employs over 1.68 Lakhs people, a big chunk of which are Indians. HCL offers application services, systems integrations, BPO services, engineering, and R&D services among others.

Total Revenue: USD 11 Billion

Image Source: Business World.com

13. Tech Mahindra Ltd.

Tech Mahindra Ltd. is part of the Mahindra Group and offers IT and BPO services including consulting and outsourcing. It was founded in 1986, a joint venture was started by Mahindra & Mahindra with British Telecom as a technology outsourcing organization. Headquartered in Pune, the total employee count of the company is over 1.25 Lakhs globally. It offers services in 100 countries and also supports the environment by banning single-use plastics from their campuses worldwide. Tech Mahindra is also one of the best in the IT service industry.

Total Revenue: USD 5.4 Billion

Image Source: The Economic Times

14. SAP

SAP SE is a German software multinational firm headquartered in Walldorf, Germany. This IT firm was founded in 1972 in Weinheim, SAP today is the third-largest software manufacturer in the world and one of the largest software companies in india the largest non- American software company by revenue. SAP offers services in technologies like machine learning, IoT, blockchain, cloud, and SAP HANA, which in turn helps in solving business problems across industries. It has an employee strength of over 1.03 Lakhs in more than 130 countries.

Total Revenue: USD 33.3 Billion

Image Source: ZDNet.com

15. Wipro Limited

Wipro Limited, founded in 1945 by Mohamed Premji, offers IT, BPO, and consulting services. The headquarters of the IT firm is in Bengaluru, Karnataka and it is one the biggest employment generating companies hiring a large number of college graduates every year. Wipro bifurcated into two entities in 2016 Wipro Limited, a public enterprise and Wipro Enterprise, a privately owned firm. The company employs 19.7 Lakhs people globally.

Total Revenue: USD 8.7 Billion

Image Source: Business Standard

16. Infosys Pvt Ltd

Founded in 1981 by NR Narayana Murthy with a group of people, Infosys is headquartered in Bengaluru, Karnataka. The company employs over 2.59 Lakh people worldwide and is known for its gender diversity with over 36% women workforce all over the world. The IT firm offers unique solutions to all its clients through software development, BPO services, and business process consulting.

Total Revenue: USD 13.56 Billion

Image Source: Reuters

17. Ernst & Young

Ernst & Young Global Limited (EY) is a professional services IT firm, headquartered in London. It is a multinational company with operations in over locations in more than 150 countries, with a global workforce of over 2.89 Lakh people. A part of the Big 4, EY is the sixth-largest privately owned firm in the US. The company has constantly been a part of Fortune’s top 100 companies to work for, for the last twenty-one years.

Total Revenue: USD 37.2 Billion

Image Source: Analytics India Magazine

18. Adobe Inc.

Adobe Inc., founded in 1982 as Adobe Systems Incorporated by John Warnock and Charles Geschke, is a multinational computer software company. It has its headquarters in San Jose, California (USA) and offers products and services in the creation and publication of different types of content like photography, graphics, illustrations, etc. Its products Adobe Acrobat, Photoshop, Illustrator among others are widely used all over the world. Adobe Inc. employs over 22 Thousand people globally, out of which about 40% work from the headquarters in San Jose. It is also one of the best in the IT service industry.

Total Revenue: USD 11.17 Billion

Image Source: Official Website

19. Intel

Intel was founded in 1968 as NM Electronics by Gordon Moore and Robert Noyce. It is a multinational technology corporation and is the largest manufacturer of semiconductor chips in the world. Intel is also the supplier of microprocessors to computer system manufacturing firms like HP, Lenovo, and Dell. The IT firm employs over 1.10 Lakh people all over the world.

Total Revenue: USD 77.87 Billion

Image Source: Reuters

20. Amazon

Amazon, headquartered in Seattle, United States is a multinational technology company. The IT firm mainly focuses on e-commerce, while providing services and products for digital streaming, artificial intelligence, and cloud computing. It was founded in 1994 by Jeff Bezos, who stepped down from the position of CEO in 2020. Amazon and its subsidiaries employ over 12.98 Lakhs people worldwide.

Total Revenue: USD 386.06 Billion

Image Source: The Wall Street Journal

21. Larsen and Toubro Infotech Limited

Larsen and Toubro Infotech Limited (LTI), a subsidiary of Larsen & Toubro (L&T) was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Mumbai, Maharashtra. It is a global IT firm offering solutions and services to its clients. Its operations are present in over 25 countries with a workforce of more than 31 thousand people working worldwide. It was ranked as India’s sixth-largest IT company in terms of export revenue by NASSCOM in 2017.

Total Revenue: USD 1.6 Billion

Image Source: Official Website

FAQ

What are the leading product-based software companies in Chennai?

There are multiple product-based software companies in Chennai. Some of them are Zoho corporation, Freshworks, Chargebee, Ramco Systems, OrangeScape, Acuvate, Clarivate Analytics and so on.

How the experience like of working in an IT company in Chennai?

Working in an IT company in Chennai can be a great experience. The city has a strong presence in the IT sector, offering numerous opportunities for career growth. With a diverse range of companies and a talented workforce, the IT industry in Chennai gives you immense exposure to the latest innovation and trends in the industry.

Does the IT companies in Chennai have a good payscale?

Yes, the IT companies in Chennai offer a good pay scale, with salaries ranging from entry-level to senior management positions. The salaries are competitive with other major IT hubs in India, making it an attractive destination for IT professionals.

What are the some highest paying IT companies in Chennai?

Some of the highest paying IT companies in Chennai include Tata Consultancy Services (TCS), Cognizant Technology Solutions, Infosys, Wipro, HCL Technologies, and Accenture, among others.
